website_summaries.verdict: Transmitter that works perfectly for adding Bluetooth connectivity inside your vehicle.
pros: Transmitter plugs into car charging port to provide continuous power
Includes a display screen for easy control of the transmitter
Delivers better sound quality than most units designed for in-car use
Includes a built-in microphone for hands-free phone calls while you're in the car
cons: May experience some problems with sound quality because of interference

customer_reviews.title: Very much improved!
customer_reviews.text: This is an updated review. A company spokesperson contacted me regarding an issue I had with a previous model. This model has a number of improvements, and everything is in order and working great. The unit pairs very quickly, and is less prone to interference from the radio stations. Great for cars that do not have built in blue tooth.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: After using my sisters bluetooth device in her car (she owns the model before this one) I knew I had to get one for myself and for under $20 it was a price I couldn't beat. I had been thinking about switching out my radio but this saved me not only time but money. I've had it for about a little over a month and it works great. Sound is clear, shows me how much voltage is in my car battery, easy bright display and I like how I can change the songs on the device itself instead of unlocking my phone and having to do it that way. I have a 2001 toyota rav4 and it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Annika-Mie Racadio

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Would give it a gold star for transmission !! The microphone could have been better.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product last week and used it over the weekend. Tried driving the car for few hundred miles and the FM transmitter works great. Even in areas with not many vacant FM slots as well it worked great. The phone microphone could have been better, as when you respond to calls you need to yell on top of your voice for the other person to hear well, so i end up using my headphones for talking. That is the reason for the 4 stars. That is the only issue, otherwise for the price this is a great transmitter.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: -UPDATE-2/4/2018 *** stars for the Nulaxy 2017 -There is a lot of static no matter what channel i use.I really wasnt happy with the product. So i left this review and the people at Nulaxy contacted me and ask if i would like to try out the NEWER version the KM22 -Believe it or not it actually works a lot better!!! I am so impressed!!! The FM transmitter has an SD card slot so i can download music on that and play it from the transmitter itself. I was skeptical but now Im a believer!!! -So for the Nulaxy KM22 I give it ***** stars!!!!
customer_reviews.author: FF2209

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: The connection to the car charger falters. I have to keep twisting it to maintain a strong connection. I hit a bump and the unit dislodges, shuts off and the Bluetooth disconnects. I tried it in three different cars and same thing. I purchased another one thinking maybe it was defective - nope. It’s just a bad design. When the connection is stable, everything about it is awesome. It’s loud, strong BT Connection, very little static on FM frequency. Even the charge is super fast. I just wish the actual car connection was stronger. Without that stable connection, it’s all for not.
customer_reviews.author: Sandalio L.

customer_reviews.title: With all the great reviews I went ahead and overlooked the bad reviews ...
customer_reviews.text: With all the great reviews I went ahead and overlooked the bad reviews but to listen to music static is annoying also plus trying to find a clear fm station is not easy. However after playing a bit if you reset tuning options like base, treble plus the volume on phone vs radio and nulaxy it is pretty clear. For the price I’m happy not perfect but better than buying a new car. One other thing for cars with auto antenna they stay up all the time while using this product so be cautious at the car wash.
customer_reviews.author: Dogtopia

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite product
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for four months now, but started having trouble with it connecting automatically soon after I purchased it. It takes its time to connect at times but not sure if its my phone or this product, though I don't have the same problem with my Bluetooth speaker and headphones. I also had problems with the off and on button so I had to super glue the button so that it can stay on. I have also tried different channels on the radio to lessen the static noise but no success. Its an overall fair product but will definitely try another product next time.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Mendoza Medrano

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Nulaxy Bluetooth FM Transmitter for my husband. He loves it. He is able to follow the safe driving law and still accept phone calls while he is in his truck. He also likes the fact that he does not have to have cds to listen to his music. This is different than the Nulaxy Bluetooth FM Transmitter that I have in my car. This one has an easy on/off button. He needed the on/off because his truck still runs power to the port he is plugged in to when the engine is off. I would recommend this! It is easy to connect to bluetooth and it is not too big!
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I've had it several weeks now and it works GREAT! The trick to it is finding a blank radio station to broadcast to and in a metroplex area that is not always easy. Once you find a good static filled channel, the Nulaxy Transmitter works like a champ!
customer_reviews.author: Dustythejones

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up, working perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: I've just received, opened, connected and tried it out. So with that in mind - It was really a 1,2,3 process. Plug in, connect my iPhone x, find a station on the km18 and my car that matched and perfect. I made a quick call and it worked great. I played some music and no problem. I had another member of my house do the same with the same results. If anything changes, I'll update my review but as of now.. I'm thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: Emz

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly in my Honda Odyssey
customer_reviews.text: My 2007 Honda Odyssey Touring did not come with bluetooth. This FM transmitter connects quickly and easily with my Google Pixel phone. I also like it because I can take phone calls using this. I use the microphone from my phone and the FM transmitter uses the speakers from the car for the car. I considered putting in bluetooth into the car but I would have had to disconnect the built in video player. This transmitter is a good compromise and a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Choo

customer_reviews.title: Some good... some bad?
customer_reviews.text: Good and bad... The bad is that people can't hear me well when on the phone with them , they say there is a lot of background noise as though I am riding with my windows down. So for me it is useless for making phone calls. The good is that everything else works well, plays my music, the display is back-lit, and It charges my phone. I gave this one away to a friend. More good... After Receiving a replacement KM22, it appears that the background noise problem has been fixed, thank you Nulaxy and customer service.
customer_reviews.author: FXST

customer_reviews.title: A little too much static....
customer_reviews.text: I do love this device!! I had to trouble installing it and it did sync with my phone very easily. I did and still do have issues with the static that happens often. I turn on the Bluetooth and there is a lot of static that comes out of the radio which I really don't like at all. Sometimes the static goes away after a while but it gets so bad I have to lower the volume. I still recommend this device, it has been worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Great for older cars
customer_reviews.text: So far, works great. You just plug it into the outlet and connect your phone and you're ready to go. There is a very small amount of feedback/static (which is unavoidable because this streams to your radio by FM) however it's not very noticeable if you have music on, especially if the music is turned up. But you can also plug the AUX cord into it and into your car AUX which fixes that if it bothers you.
customer_reviews.author: ayy lmao

customer_reviews.title: Finally one that can turn off without being unplugged!
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality of this device and the ease of use has been great, but my favorite feature is being able to press the button to turn it off and on when I'm getting out of the car. My outlets don't turn off when the car does, so it drains my battery. I had to unplug and plug in my other transmitter each time or my car wouldn't start, and it broke the hinges on it. This one is perfect because I can just turn it off and on when needed!
customer_reviews.author: Hayden Allred

customer_reviews.title: Great for playing music, but bad for phone calls
customer_reviews.text: Update: The screen doesn't work anymore and my phone can't connect to it anymore. It worked really well for about a year, so I'm really disappointed that it has already stopped working. This works great for connecting my phone to my car radio via Bluetooth. I haven’t had any issues with it for playing music, but the sound quality on the speaker during phone calls is really poor. It also doesn’t automatically find a clear radio station, so you just have to manually search for one on your radio and then change the channel on the device and hope that the station will be clear.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda 1

customer_reviews.title: Worked great until a month passed
customer_reviews.text: When I first used this to listen to music and answer the phone in the car it worked great. The sound quality is good for the average listener but sub par for an audiophile. I'm giving it 2 stars because after a month it stopped connecting to a radio frequency right away, deeming it useless until it connects. Now, for about 10 minutes (more or less) I have to listen to radio static until it connects to the frequency I have it tuned to and then I can listen to music. I've tried using different frequencies with the same results. I'm pretty disappointed in the performance of this product after a months use.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Harrier

customer_reviews.title: Performance/electrical issues
customer_reviews.text: Upon using this fm transmitter I immediately noticed electrical/performance issues with my vehicle. In every gear (5 speed manual) and at about the exact same RPMs I noticed an issue with my acceleration. Without notice I would feel a sudden deceleration at 2500-2750 rpms, major safety concern. I used this transmitter for one day. The next two days I did not use the transmitter at all and my vehicle is back to normal operation, performance issues disappeared. This transmitter is not “shielded”. Will be returning this product immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Pace

customer_reviews.title: It got smashed underfoot and still works
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had a picture but it's smashed off the screen since a friend stepped on it. Still works! I wish the dial and buttons were swapped (one controls the volume the other the channel) and it's a bit aggressive in pairing with my phone (sometimes a good thing, other times I have to manually swap to speakerphone in the car instead of it defaulting to the device, but overall I prefer a device to connect TOO easily than to be fiddly and constantly drop connection), but the voice is nice and deep and non-annoying to hear when it announces "paired". Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Bay

customer_reviews.title: This little tool just handles it
customer_reviews.text: This this actually works fast and easy. It’s rare that an electronic device does what its supposed to do. Super easy to set up and fast connection to bluetooth every time. I drive a 2005 SUV without phone connections or bluetooth. This little tool just handles it. And I love that I can hit the big button on the device to pause, rather than fumbling with my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch C

customer_reviews.title: ... be played on the car audio system and is easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: It works well in allowing my iphone content to be played on the car audio system and is easy to set up. The phone and the Nulaxy sync relatively quickly. The sounds is good. It does get unsync about three to 4 times during a 2 hour drive and I have to re-sync before the content can be broadcast on the car audio system again. It is not perfect but it allows me to here content on the phone clearly when my car window is down during driving. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: linh

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing, but...
customer_reviews.text: Product was very easy to set up and get running and it has, by far, the best audio I have ever heard from a FM transmitter. The USB port is a real fast charger and will actually charge your phone The problem I have had, and the reason why I did not give 5 stars today, is the Bluetooth functionality stopped worked. The screen freezes and I am not able to adjust audio nor is there any response from any buttons on the unit. But, you can still use the audio jack and it transmits just fine. I am gonna attempt an RMA I am p sure because I do really like this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Not an ATF Agent

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth device update
customer_reviews.text: Updated review!! The first one I received must have been a bad one. It had static issues, and the bottom cracked. Their customer service is excellent, and communicates great. I some with them and they resolved the problem. I received my replacement, and have had none of the same issues. This one works great, there is no static, and has not cracked after 3 weeks of use. I am very happy with the product and even more happy their customer service team was A+.
customer_reviews.author: F.O.G

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service!!! Product is getting a second chance
customer_reviews.text: This company's customer service gets 5 stars. Based on my original review (below), the company contacted me directly and offered to send a replacement, which I received within a couple of days. The product is perfect for my needs. I'm happy to give it a second chance. Original Review: Stopped working after five months!!!! This was a great product until the power button stopped working less than five months after purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: jjreth

customer_reviews.title: Extremely easy to use and great addition to an older car.
customer_reviews.text: I've had an old FM transmitter. I never use it because it is such a headache. This product was so easy to use. No having to press and hold for 2 seconds to pair the bluetooth and guess which frequency I need. I literally plugged it in, found it on my phone, turned my radio to the same frequency as the transmitter, and done. I'm playing songs from my phone or talking, hands-free. And for the price, it can't be beaten. It even displays your car battery life. The company is pretty good too. Gave me a 18 month extended warranty and a free transmitter that I can use for another car.
customer_reviews.author: Steven H.

customer_reviews.title: On phone calls the sound quality was poor for the person calling the car
customer_reviews.text: My phone has blutooth, that is functional, but even though it showed that the phone was found and connected music would not play through the car stereo. On phone calls the sound quality was poor for the person calling the car. Tried using the cord, and the sound quality was still poor. You could hear the station static in the background the entire time. I don't think the product works as advertised and don't recommend that anyone buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rshop

customer_reviews.title: Item replaced and working well
customer_reviews.text: Product worked extremely well for the first couple of months, but then it starting dropping bluetooth connections making it unusable after a few minutes... Basically just a phone charger at this point.... Update* Manufacturer replaced the unit with an updated one with latest software...working great so far, have not had any connectivity related issues since receiving the replacement..... Only thing is the new one no longer has a power button which was quite useful.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Really nifty for non-Bluetooth/Aux vehicles
customer_reviews.text: Just received it today. It was a really easy setup. The only downside (which seems to be the case with most Bluetooth devices) is that the radio volume has to be higher for the tethered Bluetooth station than the rest of the preset FM channels. Given that it only comes with a 6-month warranty, time will tell if it lasts more than a few months. Fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: KIND

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed with this product (Nulaxy 2017 KM18 Plus). After using the product for a week the background light in the 1.44 inch display screen stopped working, so now i'm unable to see anything on the display. I purchased the Nulaxy KM18 (without the power button by the use port) as a gift for almost a year now and it's still working pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Niceboy

customer_reviews.title: On and off button is a game changer.
customer_reviews.text: This is the secong bluetooth fm device I have bought from this company. The first one I purchased is the regular without the on and off button. Because that previous device did not have a button it broke quicker especially having to pull the device out every time I left my car. With this new one, I am able to leave it plugged in and only worry about the on and off button. Very convenient. Overall the sounds works well and it was easy to connect. It automatically connects to phone when I turn the device on. Overall decent product!
customer_reviews.author: Rcher

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work.
customer_reviews.text: The product shipped quickly; however it did not work in either of my vehicles. It plugged it fine, lit up, and then it did nothing at the main screen. I could make no adjustments on the screen. No button would change the display and both mine and my wife's phone could not find the Bluetooth signal from the device. I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Bought Two, Only One Connected Properly
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I just have too old a phone (iPhone 7 Plus) or what, but the first one I bought worked perfectly, and the second I couldn't get to connect my phone. I have been a long-time user of the previous version (without power on/off switch) for many years, so I am no stranger to troubleshooting these things. Altogether, the power on/off switch works perfectly, and the whole thing is very secure, sound is great, volume knob works great, easy to use in general and the USB output supplies plenty of power to my dash cam/phone charger. Just wish I could troubleshoot my second one properly.
customer_reviews.author: Hudson

customer_reviews.title: What an exceptional device!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased that it arrived one day after ordering it. I was more pleased to see how slim and compact, yet easily legible the screen was. Simplicity of use. Easy and quick pairing with my phone. I love it so much that I purchased a second one the day I received the first one. The second one is going to my daughter for hands free safe driving.
customer_reviews.author: tlow

customer_reviews.title: This Transmitter is great. Super easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: This Transmitter is great. Super easy to set up, plays music very clear, and voice calls are great. No more trying to struggle to hear someone on the phone, just simply plug it in, set your station, pair your phone and your good to go. Well worth the money. Update 3-6-18 So happy with the performance and great call quality, my wife wanted one for her vehicle so I ordered another one.
customer_reviews.author: cory

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this Bluetooth wireless transmitter. I have an older vehicle - no aux or bluetooth capabilities. I really wanted to be able to listen to my Amazon music library and Pandora. Also to make hands free calls.. Well this thing is doing the job. I paired it so easily with my phone. and I have been able to listen to music and answer/make calls without no issue. It's been almost two weeks and so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is a very useful little piece of technology for those whose cars don't come equipped with bluetooth. Unit works well, sturdy lighter connection fit, volume knob is handy, dedicated off switch is nice, screen is nice size and easy to read, gooseneck is on the short side so sits mostly upright rather than bent in any posable direction. Would be nice to have rubberized buttons instead of slick plastic. The real key is finding an open and consistently available radio station to connect with, but once paired sound is clear and good. Have not yet used phone answer feature so can't speak to that.
customer_reviews.author: Maypo

customer_reviews.title: Face is about 2" by 1"
customer_reviews.text: This FM transmitter is much smaller than you'd think, but big enough to read. The neck is sturdy and does not move. If using bluetooth, it pairs before you even get your car out of park. The expanded FM range is extremely helpful in removing to possibility of interference. The power button and fast charge port is just icing on the cake. I also like the battery voltage checkerwhen you start up. Very convenient for an older car. All on all, huge hit
customer_reviews.author: thekanuck

customer_reviews.title: Flawless Sound and Connection
customer_reviews.text: I really like this transmitter. I decided I wanted one to clip in my air vent instead. So I gave this one to my step daughter who needed one for her car. I just got the new one (different brand) that clips in my vent. I am sending it back tomorrow and buying another one of these. This one is much better, the sound is great, it connects to Bluetooth easily and does not lose connection and it’s user friendly. I really wish I would’ve bought this one (again) instead of going to a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Aysha Elijah

customer_reviews.title: SO happy i found this!
customer_reviews.text: I was searching on amazon, read many reviews, and came to the conclusion that this should be the best transmitter. I am very very happy with the results. The sound quality is amazing... as good as my car can get! I would recommend watching a YouTube video to connect it to your car/phone, as the directions that come with the product are a bit unclear. But i LOVE and recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: olivia

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking it would be an OK product. Well after a month this thing is amazing! The Bluetooth contact is great! I've never had any issues and it connects extremely fast once you get in the car. It took a while to find the best station, but after I found a good one it's great. The charge also works great! 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Moises

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I have a 13 year old vehicle. It is easy to use and produces extremely clear sound. I have been using it for six months now and I have no complaints. The radio antenna in my vehicle is broken. Before I purchased the Nulaxy bluetooth fm transmitter I was forced to listen to CDs. There is only so many times that you can listen to your 15 + year old cd collection. I learned after using it that I can even have bluetooth phone calls with it so "winning" in my book. Highly recommend this to anyone who does not want to go out and buy a new stereo system.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Been using for over a year
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this. My car doesn’t have Bluetooth and since the iPhone removed its auxiliary option, I have been through the ringer with fm transmitters. This is the one. Over a year in and me and my girlfriend (who both use ours in our cars) recommend it to everyone with the same problem. The charger on it charges very fast and the connection is outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Vincent

customer_reviews.title: pretty awesome unit for price
customer_reviews.text: the unit works well but was difficult to pair with my google pixel 2 xl. once it did connect it works very good. the sound is great and it looks great. i used it on my boat all weekend and really enjoy the volume feature. i have not tried any other features except the bluetooth but i am satisfied so far.
customer_reviews.author: Carl D.

customer_reviews.title: Works as described and easy learning curve for use.
customer_reviews.text: Update: Hey this thing works great. Long drive today and slacker/phone and GPS all worked flawlessly! Works well and sound quality is excellent. Setup was simple. Takes a few tries to get the sequence for pairing and working with some programs on my S8+. Honestly, finding empty FM frequencies in my home town is hardest part! I would recommend this product and will make my older vehicle that much more enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: love the bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: I have had other FM transmitters for the car, and they all suffer from noisy connections at times. This is no exception, but it is among the best. The best reason to buy this is for the bluetooth, which works great and gets rid of an annoying cord in your car.
customer_reviews.author: S. Christian

customer_reviews.title: Its an okay product
customer_reviews.text: There's static on all stations I tried tuning it to. I just picked the one with the least amount of static and it works fine if you can get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: D Hyon

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after being disappointed by the KM21 - this one is a winner. The gooseneck arrangement is very useful when plugging it into the power outlet by the gear shift in my Accord. No problems with BT connectivity dropping. Works great and I'm able to listen to music and podcasts from my phone during my commute. Have used it for a couple of calls - volume is a bit low but it is quite usable for short calls.
customer_reviews.author: Ram

customer_reviews.title: Buy this you won’t regret it !
customer_reviews.text: I got 2 of these one for my car and also one for my mom and she absolutely loves it !! I hooked her up with wired ones before and it’s always such a pain to have to have your phone connected to something and navigate music with a fm modulater Hanging from it these are awesome totally hands free that’s what we love!
customer_reviews.author: LadyVay

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. My last one broke after a year of use but I think it's because I unplugged/plugged it back in multiple times per day, scratching the adapter. Going to leave this new one with the on/off switch plugged in and will see if its life span extends.
customer_reviews.author: HonorTheSonG

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend's ancient pick-up truck and it works great! It does exactly what he needs it for - hands-free phone calls and playing music from his phone. Initially the screen didn't light up, so I contacted the company, and they sent me a brand new one right away! I really appreciated how quickly they responded and how easy it was to solve the problem. The new one is absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.author: MayaAbq

customer_reviews.title: Works, could have better volume range
customer_reviews.text: Connectivity is fine. But if I turn the FM Transmitter volume up to full (30) I still have to turn my trucks radio up past where I keep it when not using the bluetooth with my phone. But for the price, it functions fine
customer_reviews.author: Joe Durning

customer_reviews.title: Works very well, love it
customer_reviews.text: Such a great product for those of us without CD players or auxiliary Jacks . Got this for my fiance and he really enjoys this especially on long trips. Sound quality is great, easy to use and I like that it has a USB charging port built in so your outlet is accessible to charge whatever else you need. The off/on power button is a nice addition
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Great Product : )
customer_reviews.text: I have a 1994 Toyota Corolla and I have no aux or bluetooth. I bought this product because I don’t really like listening to the radio so I thought this was the perfect option for me to listen to my own music. The product arrived to my house about five days later and I rate it a10 out of 10. The sound quality is amazing for it to be a transmitter. You can also control the volume from the transmitter itself. The on and off button is also a great feature to have as well so I won’t drain your car battery when you’re not using it. I definitely recommend and will buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Mekyah

customer_reviews.title: Making my 2005 vehicle Bluetooth capable.
customer_reviews.text: Liked that it made my old 2005 Toyota High Bluetooth capable. And I can actually charge my iphone to a charger rather than using the cassette tape adapter. Liked that it can be powered on / off. Overall easy to setup. Dislike that there is a little static. No matter radio station. But not to bad, as I can now listen to all my music on my phone and talk when call comes in.
customer_reviews.author: Kulasabong

customer_reviews.title: Works great for music but for phone calls not so great.
customer_reviews.text: Works great to play music from my phone but when we call people using it they say that there is a lot of background noise and they can't always hear us. I don't know if that's because the device is picking up the car noise or if its the device itself. I did not return it because I originally got it for music, phone calls would've been a nice bonus
customer_reviews.author: L Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Super cool, great gift!
customer_reviews.text: This is an inexpensive way to listen to YOUR music even if your vehicle doesn’t have an aux connection. Simply Bluetooth your music through this handy dandy device and you can jam on! It was super easy easy to connect to my iPhone and works as described. I wish I would have bought one sooner.
customer_reviews.author: AmyJM333

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. Sanity saver
customer_reviews.text: Works flawlessly. Had frequency set at 87.9 Traveled all over Wisconsin. Never had any static or loss of clarity. Use my phone through Bluetooth to listen to my music I loaded on to it. No more horrible radios stations and commercials. Feels good to " unplug " from everything going on nowadays. I travel a lot for work and this keeps me sane. Phone calls that come in sound great and clear. I drive a 2012 chevy express work van with no options.
customer_reviews.author: STP

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an old Belkin transmitter that I use to play XM Radio to a receiver in my garage from an XM Radio home kit. I only use the FM transmit part so I cannot provide any feedback on the Bluetooth functions. My prior transmitter was weak and I was constantly adjusting the FM antenna on the receiver to try and get it to play without static. I power this Nulaxy unit with a 110 volt to 12 volt adapter and it works perfectly with enough power to play my radio with no static to the selected station number. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: JLC

customer_reviews.title: Solid unit, simple to setup
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Initial pairing was easy, now pairs automatically when I turn it on. Dont need to have a completely static channel, Ive had it power through pretty established radio channels. Call quality is also better than the built in bluetooth setup in my other vehicle. Pretty happy, especially for it being under $20.
customer_reviews.author: Noel

customer_reviews.title: Update: Great replacement
customer_reviews.text: My original review of those product was that it disconnected ever 10 minutes and always had to be power-cycled reconnect. It was very annoying. Unsolicited, I received an email from Nulaxy offering me a free replacement. It item shipped quickly and the new one works perfectly. Connects easily, no static or signal problems, and most importantly, stays connected.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Good for price but expect some static
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husbands older model truck. The screen was much smaller than I expected but livable especially for the price of the product. The main issue was finding a free fm station that didn’t cause static. He has no spot for the aux connector so he is living with the mild static. Hookup was very easy otherwise. Also like the on/off feature.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for adding SiriusXM to car w/o aux port
customer_reviews.text: I placed this in a 2003 Cadillac CTS to add Bluetooth and to use the auxiliary port of the device for my SiriusXM Radio. I can listen to my SiriusXM radio then unplug the auxiliary cable to listen to Pandora from my phone. I was pleasantly surprised by the sound quality. I had to play around with a few empty fm channels to find the best sound. I can make hand fee calls although call quality is just ok.
customer_reviews.author: PKB

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as the reviews say
customer_reviews.text: I am not satisfied with this product because of the poor quality it delivers. You could barely hear your music with the volume turned up all the way. The one thing that really bothers me is the NON-Flexibility of the head/control part. I cannot even see what the display is saying and its hard to control and manipulate to adjust accordingly. I was excited to try this based on all the reviews, but was sadly disappointed :(
customer_reviews.author: DZ

customer_reviews.title: Static and fuzzy sound
customer_reviews.text: The unit is smaller than expected it's difficult to see in the daylight and is very static over the radio. Others have difficulty hearing me and I can barely hear them because of the static.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The Bluetooth transmitter was very easy to install and it easily paired to my phone. It is a nice size, not too big and the blue lighting is a very attractive feature. It’s easy to go to the next song and the volume on/off button is big so it’s easy to use. The sound quality is great and I’m very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Crystal clear music and phone connectivity.
customer_reviews.text: For the price I was a bit skeptical, but this Bluetooth transmitter is amazing! The sound quality is amazing with no static whatsoever. Calls come in crystal clear as well! The only complaint I have is that when you exit the car with your phone while the engine and transmitter on, the phone sometimes doesn’t reconnect to to the transmitter and you have to do it manually. It’s only happened to me a couple times. Other than that for the money, this is the best transmitter out there!
customer_reviews.author: Linda G

customer_reviews.title: Just not loud enough!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, compact. Easy to use and pair. The downside is the volume isn't very loud. It's not even as loud as if I used a jack and plugged it into my car stereo. If the sound was at least that I would keep it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Very easy set up and pairing to my iPhone. Sound is great. Very little, if any distortion at higher volumes. So far on Bluetooth phone calls, the sound has been good both ways. Very impressed for how inexpensive it is. And the power button is an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: TonyN

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: The device was easy to install and setup, and soon I was listening to podcasts via my car's speakers. But then one morning out of the blue it stopped working - my phone connected but the device had stopped transmitting, as the only thing coming out of my car's speakers was static (previously I would get silence if my phone wasn't connect or was connected but not playing anything). I tried changing frequencies but all I got was white noise. Tried unplugging it and plugging it back in, nothing. There wasn't any trauma or any indication that something was wrong - one night everything was fine and the next morning it didn't work. Pretty disappointed to be honest.
customer_reviews.author: Zik

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality when on phone
customer_reviews.text: Works with my Android phone with no problem. Have a 2012 car that had no bluetooth option so was looking for a hands-free option and bought the KM-18 and am glad I did. Actually bought 2 -- one for each of our cars. Sound quality is good and appreciate the good price. Had a few questions and emailed customer service. Response was good and information was helpful. Feels good to have hands-free option while in the car.
customer_reviews.author: hcbnlb

customer_reviews.title: It  has an on/off switch
customer_reviews.text: I like the quick bluetooth connection even after I turn the unit off and then turn it in later. Very easy to pair and match with the FM radio. Small enough not to be in the way of any passengers. Phone sound is good quality, I have never had a bluetooth in this older vehicle and this is a perfect addition. Great product for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: B. Schnipper

customer_reviews.title: Good functionality
customer_reviews.text: Connected easily and has great sound. Not as strong Bluetooth as my last one but adequate for the car. Easy buttons to use while driving to charge songs or volume, love the usb plug in for my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Maun Flanagan

customer_reviews.title: so cool
customer_reviews.text: I think this is my son's favorite Christmas gift. He was so sure it wouldn't work, but it does, and he loves it. His car is older and certainly has far from current tech so this little gadget is a life save for a young man who has very particular taste in music.
customer_reviews.author: splash

customer_reviews.title: A cool gadget with a power switch!
customer_reviews.text: It's a good device! I like the fact that this device has an on/off switch. It makes this device really useful. It plays my music pretty good also. Now I don't have to worry about draining my car battery.
customer_reviews.author: Kachavion Little

customer_reviews.title: product worked great
customer_reviews.text: i loved this product it worked swell' its not as loud as the other one i ordered but it was easy to adjust and did not give me no problems with connecting to my phone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buying My Second One Today
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last year to use in our camper so we could listen to our satellite radio and iTune playlists. It has worked perfectly. I am buying my second one because my son took the camper one to use in his old car that only has a radio/cassette player and it works perfect in his vehicle too. Worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: luvpink0423

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This has been a wonderful addition for my husbands vehicle that lacks any plug in for his phone. Never a problem to have it scan and play any of his apps or music.
customer_reviews.author: Whatever It’s my opinion

customer_reviews.title: I drive a 2004 prius, which has no aux ...
customer_reviews.text: I drive a 2004 prius, which has no aux input or cassette player. I've tried several other FM transmitters before and none of them worked well. They were staticy and dropped connection all the time. This one works perfectly. I've been using it for a little over a month with no problems! It connects to my phone as soon as I turn the car on and the audio is clear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A life changer for an old-car-owner-and-commuter
customer_reviews.text: A life changer for me. I have a 10-years-old car that does not any other media inputs than tape, CD and radio. No Bluetooth. Not even an audio input cable. My commute was boring. Nulaxy Bluetooth FM Transmitter is a life changer, making my commute much more enjoyable. I now listen to audio books. I can take phone calls hands-free. It is easier to operate than the Bluetooth earphone I used to use: just one click. The audio quality is good. No noticeable static noise. Operations are easy. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: hifi_Leo

customer_reviews.title: not good.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible sound. Tried multiple stations. The package arrived like new, when I opened it, the device was not new. It has scratches and dust. Very disappointed....
customer_reviews.author: Nelo

customer_reviews.title: Works well, easy to see/use controls
customer_reviews.text: This transmitter works great! It connected right away, transmits a clear signal, and the controls are easy to see/use while driving. The controls are much more intuitive and easy to see than another model I've purchased for a couple dollars less. This one is worth the extra few dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Living The Dream

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: We have used this on several road trips and it works great. Easy to use and sounds good.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Vinson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use FM Transmitter
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth connectivity was almost instant! Very beginner friendly to use. Changing the volume and skipping songs is super easy too. My favorite feature is the goose neck -- very flexible, yet sturdy. One thing I wish could be easier would be changing channel frequency through the dial as well instead of having to hold the button, but that's fine in itself too. Hooked it up to my car and got it working in minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great for cars without aux or bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Having a car that is new enough to have just a cd player and old enough to not have an aux port or Bluetooth this product is perfect. Set up and paring is very easy but they include an aux cord just in case. A few times when listening there has been minimal static but the majority of the time the sound is very clear. Changing the volume and song is very easy, the buttons and knob are easy to find without looking at the transmitter. This model also has a button allowing you to turn off the transmitter so it isn't draining your battery.Overall a great product that has made driving more enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Gray

customer_reviews.title: Like any other FM transmitter, finicky and not very good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I kind of expected it to be just that, another FM transmitter with it's inherent problems. This is no different., Works ok for what is is. I like the fact that it has a power button and a USB port. It was priced right so no real complaints.
customer_reviews.author: 13FerdST

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice addition to your car if your car does not ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice addition to your car if your car does not have an advanced system that supports Bluetooth. Do note that this does transmit from an FM channel, but make sure to find an FM channel that is out of range from your city. I personally find this an issue because every time I use a channel around the 87.5 area, there's always a small static sound. I know it doesn't come out from the transmitter, but there's a frequency within the city limits, which causes it. Overall, the small static sound doesn't bother me too much, as I am still able to listen to my music.
customer_reviews.author: Quang Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: easy upgrade for old truck
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup and works great. My state just went hands free so I needed it for older truck. Very happy with this unit. I was surprised how small it was
customer_reviews.author: Liggett Runner

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth connection is easy, charger adapter is handy and if you use ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband 2003 Ford diesel. Bluetooth connection is easy, charger adapter is handy and if you use the right amp cord you can get a fast charge. Calls are loud and clear in the truck and on the other end and considering that it's a diesel, that's great. Very easy to set up and use.
customer_reviews.author: Nazzer

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I like about this transmitter is that it allows me to skip to the next or last song without picking up my phone and it tells me my car's battery level. The volume is much lower than my aux and CD player volume, even lower than my $8 bluetooth transmitter from Walmart. Sometimes the bluetooth connects to my phone when I get in my car and sometimes is doesnt so I have to manually connect... very iffy.
customer_reviews.author: Shanijah Telique

customer_reviews.title: Works great but did take off one star as it has ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great but did take off one star as it has these rubber grips that help hold it in the socket; which sounds like it would be a good thing, but the problem is they are such a tight fit that you almost pull out the entire lighter socket when trying to remove the transmitter.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin N.

customer_reviews.title: Music sound great! I like the knob on this unit
customer_reviews.text: This unit synch up in less than 3 seconds. I purchased a KM20 and a KM18 plus I much prefer the KM18 plus. Music sound great! I like the knob on this unit.
customer_reviews.author: D5200

customer_reviews.title: Great little product!
customer_reviews.text: I have never used one of these FM transmitters before, and I got to say it works just the way they said it would! Very easy to pair up with my phone and sounds great with my music from Amazon music. I recommend you try it out if you want to jam on stereo while on the way to work or just driving around. All the functions work great, love the on/off button too! Great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Whitesel

customer_reviews.title: Works good, buy the model with on/ switch to save battery
customer_reviews.text: Works good if you find a less powerful station. Would recommend buying the one with the on/off switch. Especially if your car outlets stay live when cars off, you will drain you battery and for whatever reason these things stick in the lighters so a switch is the way go to.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Lukacs

customer_reviews.title: Works really well!
customer_reviews.text: I love the convenience of being able to charge my iPhone and stream music from it through the speakers of my car. Since my car is old and has no audio outlet using radio frequency this way with the cigarette lighter outlet is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Murray Shelton

customer_reviews.title: My favorite 😘😘
customer_reviews.text: This product works just amazing. I would thank to the person who invented such a great product my life is so simple and I love playing the music in my car without any wire. 10 out of 10 guys😘
customer_reviews.author: Somil

customer_reviews.title: Nice device and good customer service
customer_reviews.text: The first device I got had a weird defect where it would unpair from my phone's Bluetooth after almost exactly 10 minutes, and the only way to fix the issue was to turn the device off and back on again. I contacted the seller, and they were very helpful and offered to send a replacement within only a few emails back and forth. My replacement device works great, has good sound quality, and has no issues with the Bluetooth connection.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Bixby

customer_reviews.title: This adapter is GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: This Adapter works GREAT! I have owned several adapters but this is the only one that have an On and Off switch. I can just turn it on when I need it. The others I have to pull out of the charger. Everything works GREAT! Love It!
customer_reviews.author: WilburG

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly in my Ford Escape 2006 Limited. Was surprised at how quicky the device was to setup. Ready to pair right when you plug it in. Great build quality. It might be a must to have a cigarette lighter outlite vertically on the radio area. If I had to use the horizontal one behind the shifter that would have been bad. Sound quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound Clarity
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Sound quality is good with no noise or interference. The power button is very handy so you don’t have to unplug it every time. Usually these transmitters are of below average to poor quality below $20 but this one is great so far. Definitely recommended! 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Firecam93

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work ok, but I find myself constantly having to adjust channels as I drive, which makes it very difficult to use when you leave your home area. Also, you can't really use your actual radio/cd player, or you mess up your channels. So, you better be committed to using whatever bluetooth device you have paired while in the car. Regret not sending this back in the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Marne J

product_meta.title: Nulaxy Bluetooth FM Transmitter for Car, Upgraded Manual Power On/Off Switch Wireless Car Radio Bluetooth Adapter Supports Hands free Calls, USB Fast Charging, microSD Card, Aux Play - KM18 Plus Black
feature_bullets: 1. ON / OFF BUTTON - Nulaxy KM18 Plus is an upgraded version of the Nulaxy KM18 with On / Off Button. An easier way to turn your KM18 Plus on and off. Nulaxy always thinking about your comfort while driving.

2. GREAT ADVANTAGES: Compatible with most devices on the market (Apple, Samsung, Xiaomi, Oppo, Sony) you will not have problems with compatibility. Play your favorite songs in the sound of your car through Bluetooth, TF Card, Aux Cable. Advanced noise reduction system will guarantee you a quality crystal clear sound.

3. BIG LCD DISPLAY: Developed with 1.44 inches screen to better visualize your phone calls, musics, car battery voltage. Ideal sized screen to assist drivers without disturbing the experience while driving safely.

4. TECHNOLOGY IN YOUR CAR: With our device you will add in your car: 1) Bluetooth connection; 2) Answer phone calls with a click and safely while driving; 3) Voltmeter function to control the quality of your car battery; 4) 3 different ways to play music in your car and more.

5. VOLTMETER FUNCTION: Safety when driving is our first concern, so we equip our devices with voltmeter. You can now check the quality of your battery before your trip or daily ride. Battery between 14.8V to 13.4V is when your car is on and moving. Battery between 12.8V to 12.2V is the normal voltage of the battery in your car parked and power off. Battery below 12V change the battery as soon as possible.
